qa_pairs.question: What communication bus and parameters are used by the Axess Data Collection Unit (AXDCUHB)?
qa_pairs.evaluation_criteria: Answer must specify the RS-232 Serial ASCII Bus and the correct parameters: 9600, 8, N, 1. Incorrect answers may omit the bus type or have incorrect parameters.
qa_pairs.answer: The Axess Data Collection Unit (AXDCUHB) uses a RS-232 Serial ASCII Bus with parameters 9600, 8, N, 1 for communication.

qa_pairs.question: What is the part number for the Axess Data Collection Unit (DCU)?
qa_pairs.evaluation_criteria: The answer must state the part number as AXDCUHB. Any other part number is incorrect.
qa_pairs.answer: The part number for the Axess Data Collection Unit is AXDCUHB.

qa_pairs.question: What is the ATEX rating for the Axess Data Collection Unit (AXDCUHB)?
qa_pairs.evaluation_criteria: The answer must include the full ATEX certification string: Ex II 1/2 G Ex ia IIC T4 Ga/Gb. Partial or incorrect strings are incorrect.
qa_pairs.answer: The Axess Data Collection Unit (AXDCUHB) is certified to ATEX Ex II 1/2 G Ex ia IIC T4 Ga/Gb.

qa_pairs.question: What is the IECEx rating for the Axess Data Collection Unit (AXDCUHB)?
qa_pairs.evaluation_criteria: The answer must include the full IECEx certification string: Ex ia IIC T4 Ga/Gb. Partial or incorrect strings are incorrect.
qa_pairs.answer: The Axess Data Collection Unit (AXDCUHB) is certified to IECEx Ex ia IIC T4 Ga/Gb.

qa_pairs.question: Which probe types are compatible with the Axess Data Collection Unit (AXDCUHB)?
qa_pairs.evaluation_criteria: The answer must list all three probe types: Electrical Resistance (ER), Linear Polarization Resistance (LPR), and Galvanic Potential. Omitting any of these probe types is incorrect.
qa_pairs.answer: The Axess Data Collection Unit (AXDCUHB) is compatible with Electrical Resistance (ER), Linear Polarization Resistance (LPR), and Galvanic Potential probes.
